snippet: Tchaikovsky’s symphonies were played by the orchestra of the Mariinsky Theater in St. Petersburg, where the Tchaikovsky operas and ballets are central to the institution’s identity.
lead_paragraph: Tchaikovsky’s symphonies were played by the orchestra of the Mariinsky Theater in St. Petersburg, where the Tchaikovsky operas and ballets are central to the institution’s identity.

headline.main: From Russia, Authentic Tchaikovsky, With Love

headline.seo: Mariinsky Orchestra at Carnegie Hall - Review
